name: The Climb (itch) (KamcziX)
description:
The Climb is a First Person climbing game. You are a tiny entity that appears in a room. You need to climb your way to the fridge to find a food that will help you come back to your shape. 

I came to conclusion that the best to fully experience the game is to play it with your own music, so please feel free to put whatever music you like in the background.

This is my first project gaming project I would love to hear any feedback so I can improve my game.   I will gladly repair any bugs that will be reported. I can also expand the game by adding  new levels.
